Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[MoveIt.MoveIt: Select objects by click-and-dragging a selection box. Hot-key: Control+M
Set rotation direction to vanilla CS2 relocate. If unticked, use CS1 Move It's direction.
If you're having issues with Move It crashing, try hiding the icon. Enable or disable Move It with the M key.
If you're having issues with Move It crashing, try hiding the icon. Enable or disable Move It with the M key.
Show a panel with technical output to help track down problems.
Save a zip file to your desktop with logs for the game and mods for submitting with bug reports. Note: includes your Windows username, Steam ID, system specifications, and timezone.
